statements: SELECT * FROM audit_log
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_log WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, user_id, action FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01'
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'Login';
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE action LIKE '%Delete%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'Logout';
SELECT * FROM audit_log;
SELECT id, user_id, action, date, details FROM audit_log ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_log WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_access WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT accessed_table, COUNT(*) FROM data_access GROUP BY accessed_table;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, action FROM audit_log WHERE action LIKE '%created%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, accessed_table, access_time FROM data_access WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT id, action, details FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'updated' OR action = 'deleted' ORDER BY id ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_access WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND access_time < '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT action, timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%'
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(action) AS total_actions FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions DESC
SELECT user_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles INNER JOIN audit_logs ON user_roles.role_id = audit_logs.id
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp, details FROM audits WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'A%' LIMIT 5
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE description ILIKE '%access%' AND permission_name = 'read'
SELECT * FROM audits JOIN users ON audits.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM audits ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audits WHERE action='login' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin'
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_name
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE description LIKE '%access%'
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT audit_id, table_name, operation, mod_timestamp FROM data_modifications WHERE operation IN ('insert', 'update');
SELECT description, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT DISTINCT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(mod_timestamp) AS latest_mod_timestamp FROM data_modifications GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT access_type, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY access_type HAVING access_count > 5;
